title: Part a.
stimulusHtml:
2 points

One point is earned for drawing a correctly labeled graph showing AD, SRAS, Y1 and PL1.

One point is earned for drawing a vertical LRAS at Yf to the right of Y1.
descriptions:
No points earned.

One point is earned for drawing a correctly labeled graph showing AD, SRAS, Y1 and PL1.

One point is earned for drawing a vertical LRAS at Yf to the right of Y1.

Earns 1 of 2 points.

One point is earned for drawing a correctly labeled graph showing AD, SRAS, Y1 and PL1.

One point is earned for drawing a vertical LRAS at Yf to the right of Y1.

Earns 2 of 2 points.

One point is earned for drawing a correctly labeled graph showing AD, SRAS, Y1 and PL1.

One point is earned for drawing a vertical LRAS at Yf to the right of Y1.

title: Part b.
stimulusHtml:
1 point

One point is earned for stating that aggregate demand can increase, and for explaining that government spending multiplier (1/mps) is greater than the tax multiplier (mpc/mps), therefore an equal increase in government expenditures and taxes will increase real GDP by the amount of the initial increase in government expenditures.
descriptions:
No point earned.

One point is earned for stating that aggregate demand can increase, and for explaining that government spending multiplier (1/mps) is greater than the tax multiplier (mpc/mps), therefore an equal increase in government expenditures and taxes will increase real GDP by the amount of the initial increase in government expenditures.

Earns 1 of 1 point.

One point is earned for stating that aggregate demand can increase, and for explaining that government spending multiplier (1/mps) is greater than the tax multiplier (mpc/mps), therefore an equal increase in government expenditures and taxes will increase real GDP by the amount of the initial increase in government expenditures.

title: Part c.
stimulusHtml:
1 point

One point is earned for stating that the central bank should buy bonds.
descriptions:
No point earned.

One point is earned for stating that the central bank should buy bonds.

Earns 1 of 1 point.

One point is earned for stating that the central bank should buy bonds.

title: Part d.
stimulusHtml:
2 points

One point is earned for drawing a correctly labeled money market graph.

One point is earned for shifting the money supply curve to the right and showing a decrease in the nominal interest rate.
descriptions:
No points earned.

One point is earned for drawing a correctly labeled money market graph.

One point is earned for shifting the money supply curve to the right and showing a decrease in the nominal interest rate.

Earns 1 of 2 points.

One point is earned for drawing a correctly labeled money market graph.

One point is earned for shifting the money supply curve to the right and showing a decrease in the nominal interest rate.

Earns 2 of 2 points.

One point is earned for drawing a correctly labeled money market graph.

One point is earned for shifting the money supply curve to the right and showing a decrease in the nominal interest rate.

title: Part e.
stimulusHtml:
1 point

One point is earned for stating that the supply of Zarland’s currency will increase and for explaining that financial investors seeking higher returns for their financial investments will sell Zarland’s financial assets (capital outflow) to buy foreign assets.
descriptions:
No point earned

One point is earned for stating that the supply of Zarland’s currency will increase and for explaining that financial investors seeking higher returns for their financial investments will sell Zarland’s financial assets (capital outflow) to buy foreign assets.

Earns 1 of 1 points

One point is earned for stating that the supply of Zarland’s currency will increase and for explaining that financial investors seeking higher returns for their financial investments will sell Zarland’s financial assets (capital outflow) to buy foreign assets.

title: Part f.
stimulusHtml:
1 Point

One point is earned for stating that the value of Zarland’s currency will decrease (or Zarland’s currency will depreciate).
descriptions:
No point earned

One point is earned for stating that the value of Zarland’s currency will decrease (or Zarland’s currency will depreciate).

Earns 1 of 1 points

One point is earned for stating that the value of Zarland’s currency will decrease (or Zarland’s currency will depreciate).

title: Part g.
stimulusHtml:
1 Point

One point is earned for stating that Zarland’s exports will increase and for explaining that Zarland’s goods will become relatively cheaper than foreign goods.

OR

because the depreciation in Zarland’s currency means appreciation in foreign currencies which increases the demand for Zarland’s goods.
descriptions:
No point earned

One point is earned for stating that Zarland’s exports will increase and for explaining that Zarland’s goods will become relatively cheaper than foreign goods.

OR

because the depreciation in Zarland’s currency means appreciation in foreign currencies which increases the demand for Zarland’s goods.

Earns 1 of 1 points

One point is earned for stating that Zarland’s exports will increase and for explaining that Zarland’s goods will become relatively cheaper than foreign goods.

OR

because the depreciation in Zarland’s currency means appreciation in foreign currencies which increases the demand for Zarland’s goods.
